title: "Cyborg Artistry Hub"
content:
# Cyborg Artistry Hub

Welcome to the Cyborg Artistry Hub, your go-to destination for all things cyborg art! Our website is dedicated to showcasing the best and most creative works of art featuring cyborgs. 

Our minimalist wallpaper with a single line drawing of a cyborg in a striking color such as bright red or blue is just a small taste of the amazing artwork you can find on our site. We feature a wide variety of styles and mediums, from traditional paintings to digital illustrations and everything in between.

Whether you're a fan of sci-fi, cyberpunk, or just love the fusion of man and machine, our website has something for everyone. So come explore our collection and immerse yourself in the world of cyborg art!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A minimalist wallpaper with a single line drawing of a cyborg, in a striking color such as bright red or blue."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
